price: Ɔpε sε ɔtu mo firi mo asaase no soͻ; na modwen ho sεn?”
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum famādhā tamurūna
